title: (x) chunky display sans - Gill Sans (Gill Kayo) {Thomas Lowry}
content:
What is this chunky Display face?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081016013706im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/info_3926.gif)

 [‹ (x) Borrowed Time book cover ornate serif - Tenebra {James Mark Hatley}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081016013706/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20948 "Go to previous forum topic") [Suggestions for sanserif font that can be read at 6pt/5pt down... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081016013706/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20873 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content:
Your right! I had completely forgotten what they did to poor old Gil Sans. I must have repressed the memory or something. Ouch!

Thanks!
